zh_CN.all_free_remind: 服务器"{}"的所有GPU都空闲了
zh_CN.update_page_frequent: 每隔{}秒刷新一次当前界面的显示状态
zh_CN.update_step_hint:
更新间隔（秒）
❗注意，过高的更新频率可能导致服务器启动访问防御
zh_CN.is_need_dingding_remind: 是否需要在GPU空闲时进行钉钉提醒?
zh_CN.dingding_remind_once: 只在从繁忙变为空闲时提醒一次
zh_CN.dingding_remind_every: 每次探查到空闲GPU时都提醒
zh_CN.validate_ding: 验证钉钉机器人是否正常
zh_CN.validate_dingding_help: 为验证钉钉机器人是否正常，将尝试发送一条测试信息，仅在发送失败后重置验证
zh_CN.validate_dingding_hint: 首次启动或之前存在错误时，需验证当前钉钉机器人是否正常工作
zh_CN.loading_message: Loading: 正在加载数据，请稍等...
zh_CN.dingdingTest_fail: 钉钉通知测试失败！错误信息：{}
zh_CN.dingdingTest_emptyToken: 钉钉机器人webhook为空，请检查dingtalk_token.txt文件
zh_CN.confirm_success: 已保存设置，请在右上角关闭此窗口

en_US.all_free_remind: All GPUs on server "{}" are idle
en_US.update_page_frequent: Refresh the current page display every {} seconds
en_US.update_step_hint:
Update Interval (seconds)
❗Note: High update frequency may trigger server access defense
en_US.is_need_dingding_remind: Whether send DingDing Notification on GPU Idle?
en_US.dingding_remind_have_free: Remind when there are idle GPUs
en_US.dingding_remind_all_free: Remind when all GPUs are idle
en_US.dingding_remind_once: Remind once when switching from busy to idle
en_US.dingding_remind_every: Remind every time idle GPUs are detected
en_US.validate_dingding_help: To validate the DingDing bot, a test message will be sent. Reset validation only if sending fails
en_US.validate_dingding_hint: On first startup or if there was an error previously, validate if the current DingDing bot is working properly
en_US.dingdingTest_fail: DingDing message test failed! Error message: {}
en_US.dingdingTest_emptyToken: DingDing bot webhook is empty, please check dingtalk_token.txt file
en_US.confirm_success: Settings saved, please close this window in the upper right corner
